vendor_name: Mr. and Mrs. White Hotel Corfu
title: Boutique Adults-Only Greek Island Corfu Romance with Daily Breakfast & Free-Flow Drinks
description: Escape to the idyllic Greek island of Corfu and enjoy a romantic getaway in the quaint seaside village of Acharavi at Mr & Mrs White Hotel Corfu. Dive into the majestic cobalt-blue ocean waters, explore the rugged hills of this stylish island town and feast on authentic Greek cuisine with your loved one. Lounge poolside at this perfect getaway destination, and indulge in a well-deserved afternoon wine, beer or soft drink. Take romance to the next level as you enjoy this adults-only island oasis.
offer_address: Couples Retreat Acharavi, PC 49081, Corfu, Greece

title: Grand Opening: Corfu Cliffside Opulence with All-Inclusive Dining & Guaranteed Ocean Views
description:
Perched in the pristine Agios Gordis Bay, this five-star sanctuary welcomes you to a world of understated luxury. Two outdoor pools cascade towards the sea, while the exceptional Ella Wellness & Spa offers personalised treatments to increase vitality. 

Prefer privacy? No problem - the swim-up pool in upgraded Premium rooms promises a quiet place to soak up the sunshine alongside endless ocean views. From casual dining at Cocura to a la carte Asian-South American fusion, each venue curates a unique culinary experience. 

Nestled in one of Corfu's most coveted locations, you're just steps from golden sand beaches and charming waterfront tavernas. Explore stretches of Corfiot coastline by private boat, wander through the cobblestone streets of the nearby historic Agios Gordis village, or simply unwind on your balcony as the sun paints the sky in breathtaking hues.

vendor_name: Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Glamorous Greek Island Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description: Explore the beauty of the emerald island of the Ionian Sea, Corfu, with a VIP stay at one of the top-rated resorts on the island: Grecotel Corfu Imperial; a sprawling five-star haven perched on a secluded promontory overlooking the sea. Embrace the idyllic Greek island lifestyle as you enjoy daily breakfast, a welcome bottle of wine and fruit basket on arrival and nightly dinners. Plus all Government taxes are included in your package and you can travel until the end of October 2021.

title: Beachfront Greek Island Resort with Aqua Park, All-Inclusive Dining, Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & One Child Stays & Eats Free
description:
Golden sunsets, glistening turquoise waters and an adventurous aqua park await at the perfect Greek island escape, Grecotel LuxMe Costa Botanica on Corfu. Discover the charming allure of this blissful beachfront resort nestled amongst picture-perfect cypress-studded hills, manicured gardens and unbelievable aquamarine waters. This gorgeous retreat boasts five onsite restaurants, each showcasing a celebration of flavours and cuisine, from the Mediterranean buffet restaurant in the serene courtyard, to the hearty Italian House restaurant for dining overlooking the pristine beach, and refined degustation served at Botanica Fine Dining.

Take some time to lounge by one of the freshwater oasis-inspired pools, treat yourself to a lavish facial or therapeutic massage at the spa, make memories in the sunshine at the Costa Aqua Park and completely immerse yourself in the dreamiest island escape. As the day turns to evening, sit by the Wine Library to choose from over 150 wine labels from all around the world, while the kids make the most of the Patisserie and Chocolaterie.

title: Five-Star Greek Island Escape with Nightly Dinner
description: Escape to the immaculate coast of Corfu at Rodostamo Hotel Corfu. Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace with Kommeno Bay views, this five-star hotel is the perfect base from which to explore Greece's 'Emerald Island'. Your package includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner showcasing Greek and European flavours at the main restaurant, Yiasemi, one relaxing spa massage per person, free access to the on-site gym and a refreshing welcome drink each. Complimentary shuttle services to nearby beaches and the beautiful town centre of Corfu are also included in your package.

title: Beachfront Corfu Island Resort with All-Inclusive Dining & Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Golden sunsets, glistening turquoise waters and an adventurous aqua park await at the perfect Greek island escape, Grecotel LuxMe Costa Botanica on Corfu. Discover the charming allure of this blissful beachfront resort nestled amongst picture-perfect cypress-studded hills, manicured gardens and unbelievable aquamarine waters. vendor_name: Mr. and Mrs. White Hotel Corfu
title: Glamorous Adults-Only Getaway in Striking Corfu
description: Escape to the idyllic Greek island of Corfu, easily accessible from mainland Europe, to find romance in the charming seaside village of Acharavi at the adults-only retreat Mr & Mrs White Hotel Corfu. Embrace the island vibes as you enjoy daily breakfast, a three-course dinner for two, a welcome drink on arrival, 10% discount on the à la carte menu at the stylish hotel's restaurant, complimentary beach and pool towels and complimentary Wi-Fi throughout your stay. Plus, all government taxes are included in your package, so you don't need to worry about a thing.
offer_address: Couples Retreat Acharavi, PC 49081, Corfu, Greece

vendor_name: Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Five-Star Corfu Oceanfront Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Find Greek island bliss at Grecotel Corfu Imperial - a sprawling five-star haven with the sapphire Ionian Sea as its backdrop. Sleek modern design peppered with vintage touches immediately sets a glamorous tone, backed by four private beaches, three sparkling pools and the lavish Elixir spa. An array of exquisite dining venues elevates your Mediterranean stay; savour an included daily breakfast and nightly dinner at the airy Mon Repos, then splash out and spoil yourself at the elegant Aristos restaurant or Yali Seafood, which literally floats on the sea.

Set on a private peninsula, surrounded by Corfu’s sun-drenched landscape, Grecotel Corfu Imperial is ideally located for you to make the most of the island. Known as the Emerald Island thanks to its lush greenery, Corfu boasts a rich and colourful history, evident in the Venetian fortresses and medieval laneways of its Old Town. Take some time to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed centre and historic buildings, which are just a short drive from the resort.

title: Beachfront Family-Friendly Corfu Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Spa Credit
description:
Swaths of blonde wood, views of the gentle Ionian sea and authentic Grecian dining are the dreamy touches you can look forward to at this beachfront haven. Set on a shallow beach in the area of Agios Petros, in the south of Corfu, Capo Di Corfu is ideally located to uncover the island's medieval multi-cultural heritage, moulded by years of Venetian, French and British rule.

Mediterranean cuisine is available across six restaurants and bars. Become enchanted by the sea while dining at the oceanside Il Pirata, offering traditional Lefkimmi Corfu dishes with ingredients plucked from the hotel's own garden. Experience Greek fine dining at Luna Rosa, enjoy all-day eats at Arete and savour icy cocktails by two freshwater pools.

Family-friendly without sacrificing tranquility, young guests are spoiled with a kids' club, playground and waterslides, all while adults can indulge in pampering at the onsite spa.

vendor_name: Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Five-Star Greek Island Retreat with Roundtrip Transfers, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description:
For Greek island seclusion, you can't get any better than a stylish stay at Grecotel Corfu Imperial - a sprawling, five-star haven perched on a rugged promontory with the sapphire Ionian Sea as a backdrop. Sleek modern design peppered with vintage touches immediately sets a glamorous tone, backed by four private beaches, three twinkling swimming pools, an array of dining venues, the lavish Elixir spa and so much more.

On a private peninsula, surrounded by Corfu’s sun-drenched landscape and overlooking the waters of the Ionian Sea, Grecotel Corfu Imperial is ideally located for you to make the most of the island. Known as the Emerald Island thanks to its lush greenery, Corfu boasts a rich and colourful history, evident in the Venetian fortresses and medieval laneways of its Old Town. Take some time to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed centre and historic buildings, which are just a short drive from the resort.

title: Modern Beachfront Corfu Escape with Private Beach, Infinity Pool, Four Restaurants & Day Spa
description:
Set on the shimmering waters of the Ionian Sea, this elegant beachfront stay seamlessly blends traditional Greek charm with modern luxury. Soak up breathtaking views of the sparkling sea or Gouvia Marina, stroll along one of two private beaches, cool off in the resort's infinity pool or indulge in rejuvenating treatments at the state-of-the-art wellness spa.

Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Corfu Town, just a short drive away, or keep busy with a selection of in-house activities including yoga, cooking classes and Syrtaki dancing. After an adventurous day, dine to your heart's content across four restaurants, offering a diverse selection of Mediterranean, seafood and international fare, or relax with a cocktail at one of the two bars.

title: Opulent Corfu Seaside Suites in 18th-Century Olive Mill with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Located in an olive grove on Corfu's southeastern coast, The Olivar Suites honours its heritage as a former 18th-century olive oil mill. A beautiful outdoor pool serves as the heart of the resort, while Flya restaurant celebrates Mediterranean flavours using local ingredients and the hotel's herb garden. The spa is a wellness sanctuary, offering treatments inspired by ancient Greek healing practices.

Perched along the pristine shores of Messonghi Beach, this resort is your gateway to relaxation and adventure. Spend mornings exploring the traditional fishing village of Messonghi, and afternoons discovering hidden coves by private boat or taking scenic drives through the hills to reach Corfu's UNESCO-listed Old Town, just 30 minutes away.

vendor_name: Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort to Live
title: Corfu Oceanfront Island Elegance with Private Beach, Eight Bars & Restaurants & Onsite Spa
description:
Experience the ultimate Greek island getaway at this luxurious five-star resort, set against the stunning backdrop of the sapphire Ionian Sea. With sleek, modern design accented by vintage charm, the resort exudes glamour from the moment you arrive. Enjoy access to four secluded beaches, three sparkling pools and the indulgent Elixir spa.

Elevate your Mediterranean escape with diverse dining options. Start your day with breakfast at the airy Mon Repos, then treat yourself to a gourmet experience at the elegant Aristos restaurant or the unique Yali Seafood, which floats directly on the water.

Beyond the resort, discover Corfu's rich heritage with a short drive to the UNESCO-listed Old Town, home to Venetian fortresses and historic buildings. Nestled on a private peninsula amidst Corfu’s sun-soaked scenery, Corfu Imperial, A Grecotel Resort is the perfect base to explore the Emerald Island, renowned for its lush greenery and vibrant history.

title: Five-Star Corfu Adults-Only Suites with Private Beach & Six Restaurants & Bars
description: Immerse yourself in the sun-drenched Grecian allure of Nido, Mar-Bella Collection, a stylish adults-only sanctuary perched on Corfu's southeastern coast. Embrace romantic seclusion at this pastel-hued abode, boasting luxurious suites, a tranquil outdoor infinity pool, plush spa and six exquisite restaurants and bars. Take a stroll on the private beach and take in spellbinding vistas of the azure Ionian Sea, or if you wish to explore, the UNESCO-listed Corfu Old Town is moments away.

title: Five-Star Greek Island Escape with Private Beach, Corfu's Highest Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
description: Immerse yourself in the Mediterranean charm of Angsana Corfu Resort & Spa, a luxurious five-star retreat perched atop a hill overlooking the azure Ionian Sea. This Hellenic sanctuary offers an exquisite blend of traditional Greek hospitality and Asian wellness philosophies. Explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Old Town of Corfu, float in the 1000sqm infinity pool, savour the flavours of the Mediterranean at the hotel's five oceanfront venues, or unwind at the indulgent Angsana Spa.
offer_address: 11th Km - Kerkyra Lefkimi National Road, Corfu, Greece
